title: Logo Redesigns Gone Wrong
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011091017im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Maple_Pictures_Old_4517.png)

The first time I saw the original Maple Pictures logo I knew the $12.50 I'd spent was worth it, even if the movie was a piece of piss. The way the animation rotated and the tree rings formed the letters just struck a chord in me.

AND THEN THIS HAPPENED!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011091017im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MaplePictures_New_5998.jpg)

What in the hell were they thinking? What does this say other than we typeset some letters and put a box around them?

I have started this thread hoping to see you add other logos/branding that were redesigned so poorly that you're left wondering "How did this happen?"

Pepsi anyone?
author: TKDesign

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011091017im_/http:/typophile.com/files/netcomlogo_5808.jpg)
  
The new one (right) is even worse than the old 90s logo.

Some horrid ones here. [http://ocondesign.com/?p=945](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011091017/http:/ocondesign.com/?p=945 "http://ocondesign.com/?p=945")

DQ - Atrocious. Just ridiculous.

Mastercard - WTF is with the magnifying glass cloudy gradient sphere?

Kraft - The DairyQueen 'designer' landed another client.

The Bank of New York - I loved the logo they had before — It's gorgeous. Sad they went with a sideways star trek badge after the merger.

wow penn, I hadn't seen the MasterCard one yet. That's just...wow. I don't even have words for that one.

The Animal Planet redesign bothered me as well. I wasn't a fan of Discovery's redesign initially either (not that the old one was especially good) but it's grown on me: [http://www.frederiksamuel.com/blog/2008/04/discovery-channel-rebranding....](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011091017/http:/www.frederiksamuel.com/blog/2008/04/discovery-channel-rebranding.html "http://www.frederiksamuel.com/blog/2008/04/discovery-channel-rebranding.html")
